posts.post_content:
Greetings everyone, I am interested in buying an 1895 N300 Mayo Kid Nichols. Looking for gd-vg or vg range and graded. Please email if you have anything available.
Thank You

Hi  I have two SGC Kid Nichols Mayos----I believe one is a 50 or 60 and the other is a lower grade  maybe 30---I am at my summer camp right now and the cards are at home---I will go back in a day or two and can check if u are interested,  I also will be at the National with my mayos etc.  let me know  thanks,  Don
